text:
@BBCSport @steefc1977 RT @steefc1977: RT @BBCSport: Sergio Aguero says footballers are "scared" about the prospect of returning to action amid the coronavirus pandemic https://t.co/mtBw7bFi8S https://t.co/skakY0jLo4

Everyone should be scared!

Stay Safe
Save Lives
Stay Home
Outside Keep Your Distance

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Sport
domain.description: Types of sports, like soccer and basketball

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Athlete
domain.description: An athlete in the world, like Serena Williams or Lionel Messi

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
